statements: SELECT * FROM credit_scoring;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM credit_scoring WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, fraud_score FROM credit_scoring WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT * FROM credit_scoring WHERE credit_score BETWEEN 600 AND 800;
SELECT id, customer_id, credit_score, fraud_score FROM credit_scoring ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_scoring WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM credit_scoring WHERE fraud_score < 50 ORDER BY credit_score ASC;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM credit_scoring WHERE fraud_score >= 30 AND credit_score BETWEEN 600 AND 800 ORDER BY fraud_score DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(credit_score) AS total_credit_score FROM credit_scoring GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_credit_score > 2000 ORDER BY total_credit_score DESC;
SELECT AVG(credit_score) AS avg_credit_score, MAX(fraud_score) AS max_fraud_score FROM credit_scoring WHERE credit_score < 700 AND fraud_score > 20;
SELECT * FROM credit_score;
SELECT id, score, customer_id FROM credit_score ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, score FROM credit_score WHERE score > 700;
SELECT customer_id, fraud_score FROM fraud_detection WHERE fraud_score < 50;
SELECT id, customer_id, fraud_score FROM fraud_detection WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT id, customer_id, score FROM credit_score WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, fraud_score FROM fraud_detection WHERE fraud_score > 50 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT id, customer_id, score FROM credit_score WHERE score BETWEEN 500 AND 700 ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, customer_id, fraud_score FROM credit_score JOIN fraud_detection ON credit_score.customer_id = fraud_detection.customer_id WHERE credit_score.score > 600;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(score) AS avg_score FROM credit_score GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(score) > 600 ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_scores;
SELECT customer_id, score FROM credit_scores WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, detection_result FROM fraud_detection WHERE detection_result = true;
SELECT service_name, service_endpoint FROM third_party_service;
SELECT id, customer_id, score FROM credit_scores ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_scores WHERE score > 700 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, detection_result FROM fraud_detection WHERE detection_result = true;
SELECT id, service_name FROM third_party_service WHERE service_name LIKE '%api%' ORDER BY service_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, score FROM credit_scores WHERE score BETWEEN 600 AND 800;
SELECT id, service_name, service_endpoint FROM third_party_service WHERE service_endpoint IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, fraud_status FROM fraud_detection WHERE fraud_status = true;
SELECT user_id, name, credit_scores.score FROM users JOIN credit_scores ON users.user_id = credit_scores.user_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT * FROM CreditScore;
SELECT customer_id, score FROM CreditScore ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT service_id, service_name FROM ExternalServices WHERE service_url LIKE '%api%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerInformation WHERE name='John Doe';
SELECT transaction_id, is_fraud FROM FraudDetection WHERE is_fraud=true;
SELECT customer_id, score FROM CreditScore WHERE score > 700;
SELECT service_name, service_url FROM ExternalServices ORDER BY service_name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM CustomerInformation WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, log_timestamp FROM TransactionLogs WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM FraudDetection WHERE is_fraud = true;
